SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Book
This class represents an instance of a book in the library database.
BookCellFactory
This class determines how a Book object is presented in a ListView.
BookColumns
This class contains static Strings used for accessing database columns in the library database.
BookStatus
This enum represents the checked status of a Book object.
ConfirmationDialog
This class represents a dialog used to get a confirmation from the user.
DatabaseFormDialog
This class represents a dialog used to obtain connection information for an external database provided by the user.
DatabaseManager
This class represents the database layer of the library management system.
ExternalSQLHandler
This class is responsible for handling data retrieval operations from external user-provided databases.
IBookController
This interface is used to allow for the application layer to call methods within the controller layer without directly accessing the controller layer.
Launcher
This class is used to launch the JavaFX application from a JAR file.
LibraryApplication
This is the insertion point of the library management system application.
LibraryController
This class processes and responds to user interaction with the user interface.
LibraryCore
Represents the application layer of the library management system.
MessageDialog
This class represents a dialog used to display a message to the user.
MessageType
This enum is used to determine the type of MessageDialog to be displayed to the user.
PreviewBooksDialog
This class represents a dialog used to display books the user provided to add to the library database.It asks them for confirmation before handing off control back to the controller layer.
SQLForm
This class represents a data object used for transporting external database connection information from the user to the application layer where it can be processed.
SQLSourceType
This enum is used for determining the type of supported database source types.
